data.actual_result: Text entry box goes away and on screen keyboard overlaps messages
data.expected_result: The app should operate as normal, with text entry box on the screen and keyboard not overlapping with message.
data.short_description: (iPhone X exclusive) Text entry box disappears and keyboard overlaps messages.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a text channel open with keyboard on the screen - Open App Switcher - Wait for another message to be sent in the text channel - Go back to the Discord App
